Direct message the job poster from Harnham
Mikayla Memoracion
Recruitment Consultant -Data Science (U.S. West) at Harnham
THE COMPANY This company is the top leader in California in manufacturing robotic-assisted surgery systems. With a heavy focus on engineering, this intuitive company uses unique and complex data to design, manufacture, build, and assemble these robots.
THE ROLE As a Senior Manager of Data Science, you will be responsible for laying out the function and roadmap for the company and team. You will be painting growth for the company through hands-on coding and overseeing/mentoring your team and projects.
YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE To be considered for this role, you must have experience in the following:6+ years of full-time experience, managing data science teams and projectsAdvanced degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Data Science, or another quantitative fieldPython, Databricks, Jupyter Notebook, Tensorflow/PytorchBuilding machine learning models from scratchTime series modelsHaving built/improved something from your last company that led to organization recognitionPrevious experience in the manufacturing industry is a plus!***You must have 2-3 references that can speak on your leadership skills and impact on the company
THE BENEFITS As a Senior Manager of Data Science, you can expect to make a salary of $210,000 to $230,000 (contingent on experience) plus bonus, equity, and competitive benefits. HOW TO APPLY Please register your interest by sending your CV and 2-3 references to Mikayla Memoracion via the Apply link on this page.
